Desc.entry: A not-for-profit organisation, providing tuition in Mandarin Chinese, the official language of China, to children and young people aged 5 to 18 years, at weekends during school term-times. Offers classes at different levels which are open to all, for both English-speaking children and Chinese-heritage children. All levels of Chinese language are welcome from absolute beginners to the advanced. Tuition and preparation trainings are offered for gaining national recognised qualifications, such as OCRs Asset Languages (Mandarin) and Edexcels GCSE Chinese and A-Level Chinese. The School also runs Painting and Chinese folk dancing classes. Seeks to promote Chinese culture in the area. Celebrates Chinese New Year around Febuary and mid-autumn festival in September.
